solution_line_template: Each bag was ${bag_original_price} but was marked down {discount_percent_num}% for clearance so that's {bag_original_price}*{discount_percent_decimal} = $<<{bag_original_price}*{discount_percent_decimal}={discount_amount}>>{discount_amount} discount

Each bag was ${bag_original_price} and there is a ${discount_amount} discount so each bag is {bag_original_price}-{discount_amount} = $<<{bag_original_price}-{discount_amount}={bag_price_after_discount}>>{bag_price_after_discount}

Each bag was marked down to ${bag_price_after_discount} a bag and she bought {num_bags} bags for a total of {bag_price_after_discount}*{num_bags} = $<<{bag_price_after_discount}*{num_bags}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
